q1_general_response: {"answer": "Based on the image, the lesion could potentially resemble: 1. Atypical nevus (dysplastic nevus). 2. Seborrheic keratosis. 3. Lentigo (simple lentigo or solar lentigo). 4. Pigmented basal cell carcinoma. 5. Dermatofibroma."}
